sentences.en: A crumpled scrap of paper was found in her handbag.
sentences.cn: 在她的手提包里发现了一张皱巴巴的小纸片。

sentences.en: a paper bag
sentences.cn: 纸袋

sentences.en: a paper on the Civil War
sentences.cn: 一篇关于南北战争的论文

sentences.en: Do you have a pen and paper?
sentences.cn: 你有笔和纸吗？

sentences.en: Ferris has a rare ability to record her observations on paper.
sentences.cn: 费里斯具备把自己的观察结果记录下来的超强能力。

sentences.en: He crunched the sheets of paper in his hands.
sentences.cn: 他把那沓纸揉得嚓嚓响。

sentences.en: He snapped his fingers, and Wilson produced a sheet of paper.
sentences.cn: 他打了个响指，威尔逊便递过一张纸来。

sentences.en: He wiped away the blood with a paper napkin.
sentences.cn: 他用纸巾将血迹擦去。

sentences.en: Her colourful oils and works on paper have a naive, dreamlike quality.
sentences.cn: 她那些色彩斑斓的油画与纸上作品给人一种天真、梦幻般的感觉。

sentences.en: I used to edit the college paper in the old days.
sentences.cn: 以前我曾经做过大学校报的主编。

sentences.en: I’ll get you a piece of paper so you can write the number down.
sentences.cn: 我给你找张纸，你好把号码写下来。

sentences.en: It is a good team on paper, but its members play poorly together.
sentences.cn: 在理论上它是一支不错的队，可是队员们配合不好

sentences.en: paper over a deficit with accounting gimmicks.
sentences.cn: 在帐上耍花招来掩饰亏空

sentences.en: Randall would just now be getting the Sunday paper.
sentences.cn: 兰德尔这个时候应该正在拿周日的报纸。

sentences.en: She came out with two packages wrapped in holly-sprigged paper.
sentences.cn: 她抱着两个用带有冬青枝叶图案的纸包装的盒子走了出来。

sentences.en: She tore off two sections of paper towel and folded them lengthwise.
sentences.cn: 她撕下两格纸巾，然后纵向对折。

sentences.en: Stein rolled up the paper bag with the money inside.
sentences.cn: 斯坦把装了钱的纸袋卷了起来。

sentences.en: the 1998 White Paper on political reform
sentences.cn: 1998年政治改革白皮书

sentences.en: The new copiers only copy onto one side of the paper.
sentences.cn: 新复印机只能单面复印。

sentences.en: The paper'sprice rise will encourage readers to desert in even greater numbers.
sentences.cn: 报纸价格的上涨将导致更多的读者不再订阅。

sentences.en: The previous owners had obviously papered over any damp patches.
sentences.cn: 原先的房主显然是用壁纸把潮斑都盖起来了。

sentences.en: The shop stocks everything from cigarettes to recycled loo paper.
sentences.cn: 商店货品齐全，从香烟到再生厕纸应有尽有。

sentences.en: There's always tons of scrap paper in Dad's office.
sentences.cn: 爸爸的办公室里总有大量的废纸。

words.tran_cn: 文件,特权,遗嘱,证件,收据

phrases.phrase: be not worth the paper it is written on

phrases.tran_cn: 理论上：在理论上，不同于真实的表现或事实
虚饰：掩饰或暂平息（如不同点），尤其为了维持名义上的、表面的或暂时的团结
试纸；测验试卷；供检定笔迹的文件

trans.tran_cn: 纸，报纸，材料，壁纸，论文，试卷，文件
trans.tran_en: material in the form of thin sheets that is used for writing on, wrapping things etc
to decorate the walls of a room by covering them with special paper
to decorate the walls of a room by covering them with special paper
